tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machine_maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE machine_schedule (
  machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_name VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_schedule (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE 3d_printing_machines (
    machine_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_interval INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE 3d_printers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  build_volume VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  printer_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE materials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  printer_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE service_technicians (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT,
  certification VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(50)
)
